preboard_hero_paragraph_1: Welcome to Pixel&Code and this preboarding express! We're so thrilled to have you on board. Our aim is to integrate you into the team, starting right now. This page outlines your journey from the day of your contract signing to your start date.
preboard_hero_paragraph_2: Our employees are our greatest asset and we are committed to create a workplace that inspires and offers competitive compensation, success and wellbeing. We encourage open communication, teamwork, and mutual respect. We prioritize work life balance and we foster a culture of professional development, innovation and creativity.
preboard_hero_paragraph_3: Before we start, if you haven't already done so, please take a moment to fill out this form with your basic information.
preboard_alert_message: You do not have permission to open that admin area. This preboarding space is always here for you instead.
preboard_language_indicator_hint: Use this URL when sending the page to customers.
preboard_timeline_intro: We start integrating you today. Follow the steps to know exactly what's next before day one.
preboard_timeline_step_1_subtitle: Things we can do right away.
preboard_timeline_step_1_desc_1: We want you to become a part of the team as soon as possible. Access to your email, Discord, Microsoft 365 account and more.
preboard_timeline_step_1_desc_2: We will create your first Pixel&Code CV for you so that we are ready when an exciting client reaches out.
preboard_timeline_step_1_desc_3: You also have the opportunity to be paired with a buddy. This Pixel&Code insider is available as your personal guide if you choose to use them. They're here to lend a hand, answer questions, and support you in a way that feels comfortable.
preboard_timeline_step_2_subtitle: You will get invited to events.
preboard_timeline_step_2_desc_1: You will get invited to various social events. This is an opportunity for you to form early connections, learn from others, and start feeling like part of the team.
preboard_timeline_step_2_desc_2: We're excited to introduce you to all of us. Remember, while we encourage participation, all of the activities are optional.
preboard_timeline_step_3_desc_1: Hopefully you'll hear more about possible assignments that could be relevant to you before your first day. You might even have the opportunity to do an interview.
preboard_timeline_step_3_desc_2: We always include you in our dialogues with clients regarding possible assignments. It is important that the assignment and client culture feels right and fun.
preboard_timeline_step_4_desc_1: On your first day we walk through everything you need to know. Details may vary a little depending on assignments, but the core is the same.
preboard_timeline_step_4_desc_2: If you start on a customer assignment day one, we plan the details with you to make it as smooth as possible. Oh, and lunch is on us!
preboard_resources_intro: The essentials you need to plug in quickly. Expand a topic to see the nitty gritty details.
preboard_resource_m365_desc_1: You get your very own Microsoft 365 license with Outlook, Teams, Word, PowerPoint and Excel.
preboard_resource_m365_desc_2: Email address: firstname.lastname@pixelcode.se. Username: your email address.
preboard_resource_m365_desc_3: Default password will be sent separately. Change it when you log in for the first time.
preboard_resource_discord_desc_1: Discord is our primary tool for day to day communication.
preboard_resource_discord_desc_2: Come say hi when you're inside.
preboard_resource_discord_desc_3: Our server: https://discord.gg/BSjy9EAj — come say hi when you're inside.
preboard_resource_social_desc_1: We currently focus on LinkedIn. Follow us to stay in the loop and help boost the team.
preboard_resource_telephony_desc_1: Our partner in mobile telephony, for both phones and subscriptions, is Comcenter.
preboard_resource_telephony_desc_2: They will help you with new contracts, transferring an existing number, or anything else you need. Reach out before purchasing so we can guide you on preferred stores and agreements.
preboard_story_paragraph_1: Pixel&Code was founded to revolutionize and simplify the tech consulting industry. Our mission is to bring together a world class team and offer unparalleled opportunities for personal and professional growth.
preboard_story_paragraph_2: We believe inspired employees create inspired clients, and together we can deliver world class results. Competitive compensation, meaningful benefits and a truly inspiring work environment are the pillars we build on.
preboard_faq_1_question: When will I get access to my email and Discord?
preboard_faq_1_answer: You'll get access to your work email and other tools like Discord and Microsoft 365 as soon as possible, but it will be within a few weeks from your signing date.
preboard_faq_2_question: Who will be my point of contact during the preboarding process?
preboard_faq_2_answer: Your main points of contact are your buddy and your hiring manager. They will guide and support you every step of the way.
preboard_faq_3_question: What kind of information do I need to provide in the personal information form?
preboard_faq_3_answer: We need the basics needed to create your staff card. This includes bank account details, emergency contact, Social Security Number and similar essentials.
preboard_faq_4_question: What happens if I can't attend a social event?
preboard_faq_4_answer: All activities are optional. We understand everyone has different commitments and schedules, and we schedule several events so everyone has opportunities to join when they can.
preboard_faq_5_question: Who will be my buddy and how will they support me?
preboard_faq_5_answer: We offer a buddy based on your experience and profile, someone who can provide valuable support and insights. Use the relationship how you feel comfortable. We even suggest buddy lunches (our treat) as a relaxed way to get to know each other.
preboard_faq_6_question: What kind of tasks might I be involved in before my first day?
preboard_faq_6_answer: Besides social events and chatting with future colleagues, we include you in our client dialogues regarding potential assignments. It is important that you find the assignment and client culture engaging and enjoyable.
preboard_faq_7_question: What should I expect on my first day?
preboard_faq_7_answer: We make sure you feel welcome and set up for success. We guide you through system access, time reporting, expense registration, and more. We also make the day enjoyable and treat you to a relaxed lunch.
preboard_faq_8_question: How does it work with computers, phones, and other tools when I start?
preboard_faq_8_answer: We value individual choices. If you have great hardware already, feel free to keep using it. If you are missing something, you can purchase it and expense it against your budget. Contact us before purchasing so we can guide you.
preboard_faq_9_question: How does it work with mobile subscriptions?
preboard_faq_9_answer: You can continue using your existing plan and expense it monthly. Our partner can also help you find a new plan linked to the company. Email Robert@comcenter.nu or call 08 692 43 01 for support.
preboard_faq_10_answer: It depends on your compensation model. The flexible model gives you a personal budget to use as you see fit. The fixed model includes an annual SEK 12,000 education budget.
preboard_faq_11_question: Who can I contact if I have questions about the handling of my personal info?
preboard_faq_11_answer: If you have any questions about how we handle your personal information, contact your hiring manager. We're here to help.
preboard_hero_slide_1_alt: Team reconnecting out in the forest.
preboard_hero_slide_6_alt: Linus throwing a frisbee in the park.
preboard_gallery_image_1_alt: Welcoming Danny on his first day.
preboard_gallery_image_2_alt: Oliver and Azra in a thoughtful discussion.
preboard_economy_title: Only the essentials, the rest arrives during onboarding.
preboard_economy_general_line_1: If you have questions, contact your hiring manager first.
preboard_economy_general_line_2: Our economy team helps with expenses, invoices and all financial nuts and bolts.
preboard_economy_general_line_4: Invoices can be sent to pixelcode@invoice.kleer.se. Make sure your name is clearly stated so we know who did what.
preboard_economy_expenses_line_1: Digital receipts from websites, email or apps can be emailed to kvitton@expense.kleer.se from your Pixel&Code email address.
preboard_economy_expenses_line_2: You can also upload receipts directly in PE via drag and drop.
preboard_economy_expenses_line_3: Paper receipts can be photographed in the PE app and do not need to be saved afterward.
preboard_feedback_description: Missing something? Share feedback and help us improve this experience for the next teammate.
preboard_feedback_label: How can this preboarding page get better?
preboard_linkedin_label: With a license to be awesome
preboard_linkedin_title: We are here to support your journey.
preboard_linkedin_description: Stay connected with us on LinkedIn for news, events and glimpses into life at Pixel&Code.
